response.overview: Anger Management is a short action-comedy film about the pressure to succeed in life, mundane despair and the smallest day-to-day obstacles that drive us nuts. The story follows Jean - a young woman working at a posh marketing agency. When being tasked to lead a team of unhinged minimalists to create a rebranding campaign for a fried chicken company, Jean discovers a mystical haven for her frustration. However, what begins as a safe place to let go of her anger, soon begins to pierce through to the real world.
response.title: Anger Management
